com.facebook.react.bridge

类 ModuleSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.bridge.ModuleSpec

  • public class ModuleSpec
extends java.lang.Object
    A specification for a native module. This exists so that we don't have to pay the cost for creation until/if the module is used. If your module either has a default constructor or one taking ReactApplicationContext you can use simple(Class) or simple(Class, ReactApplicationContext)} methods.

    • 方法概要

      Simple spec for modules with a default constructor.
      static ModuleSpec simple(java.lang.Class<? extends NativeModule> type, ReactApplicationContext context)
      Simple spec for modules with a constructor taking ReactApplicationContext.
      static ModuleSpec viewManagerSpec(javax.inject.Provider<? extends NativeModule> provider)
